description: Request for approval of plans and specifications (permanent works) pursuant to Schedule 7 of the Crossrail Act 2008 for erection of interchange concourse enclosure and part single, part two and part three-storey station services structure associated with the Crossrail Farringdon (West) station, and other associated works.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: Prior to the installation of the Western Ticket Hall services structure, samples of all external finishes, including bronze expanded metal screens, acrylic render and bronze cladding shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority in accordance with paragraph 6(2) of Schedule 7 of the Crossrail Act 2008.

The hereby approved finishes shall be implemented in strict accordance with the details so approved prior to the completion of the Crossrail station development at Farringdon and retained and maintained as such thereafter.

REASON: To ensure the permanent works preserve the local environment, local amenity and sites of historic interest.
